results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Avandamet or Uptitrated Metformin Treatment in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled with Metformin Alone: A Multicenter, Randomized, Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: Comparable results concluded from this study in Chinese @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ also indicated that there may be no ethnicity difference in @<m>CHEMICAL_rosiglitazone_metformin_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C471074 @@@Avandamet@@@ treatment.
